property.name: jdbc.driver
property.description: Class name of the JDBC driver (e.g. org.postgresql.Driver)

property.name: jdbc.url
property.description: The URL that the JDBC driver can use to connect to the database (e.g. jdbc:postgresql://localhost/postgres)

property.name: jdbc.user
property.description: User name for connecting to the database (e.g. postgres)

property.name: jdbc.password
property.description: Password for connecting to the database (e.g. postgres)
